title: ParkServe
description: Urban park data for over 15,000 cities and towns across the U.S. Included in the data downloads are park polygons, park 10-minute walk service areas, park priority areas, trails and playgrounds in parks.
creator: Trust for Public Land
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign

spatial_resolution_note: Resolution varies by dataset and field
